title: Low priority queue and lag
body: So I have been noticing lag in league of legends ever since June of season 6. And recently, the lag has gotten worse. I wanted to know if there is any way to speed up my league of legends because I have gotten low priority queue due to lag. When champion select finishes, I get a black screen. However, after the black screen, normally the loading screen pops up but now I just wait for about 10 minutes then when it loads it says that the game is done, my team has remade, and that I have gotten a low priority queue. Is there any way to fix this?

replies.body:
It definitely sounds like your client is having a tough time establishing a stable connection to the game server. This is frequently caused by network configurations local to your computer that prevent this solid link from happening. As a starting point, I recommend checking out our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for the most common solutions for this.

Let me know if that guide helped resolve this.
